comment: "Paid for feature writing plus original photos. One of my favorite publications to write for, ever. Every time I work for AO, I think what a career highlight it is, and I have been at this for over a decade. Really trust the editors' judgment, appreciate the respectful professionalism, and always glad to take them my best ideas. Very recommendable."
